articles.author: John Bett
articles.title: Star Wars fans amazed after spotting 'lightsaber' on Mars in new NASA footage - The Mirror
articles.description: The item on Mars certainly looks like a 'lightsaber', as it is a thin metal tube with a thick end, which could be a handle. It also has a thinner side, which could form the blade part
articles.content: Star Wars fans thought they'd found proof that there was another Jedi out there, after spotting a 'lightsaber' on Mars in a new picture released by NASA. The image in question shows a thin metal tube… [+3228 chars]
